column5: Looking like a great time. Free seminars throughout the day & a chance to win 1 of 2 Salmon Charters on Lake Ontario.
UgliBoys is looking forward to it.
Should be fun! Looking forward to seeing everyone there!

Shaping up to be a  great event. Local shops like Grimsby Tackle,  Bill's Bait and Peters Tackle will be there as will other small home grown businesses and many other individuals with lots of goodies. As well as some very good seminars happening every hour.  Every paid entry has a shot at winning one of 2 Lake Ontario Salmon Charters and the St Catharines Game and Fish Association will also be raffling off a nice Ice Fishing Package.
We'll be there! Look foward to seeing everyone!
